back_text: Scenario Contents: Wrecher A, Thunderball A, Piledriver A, and Bulldozer A as villains. (Version b for increased difficulty.) Wrecker, Thunderball, Piledriver, and Bulldozer encounter decks. Setup: Put the Day of Reckoning, Thunderstruck, Pile It On!, and Clear the Road side schemes into play. Place the active counter on Wrecker. Advance to stage 1B.
name: Breakout
text: Forced Response: After step one of the villain phase, place 1 threat on each side scheme. Move the active counter to the villain whose scheme has the most threat. (If there is a tie, the first player chooses.) If theis stage is completed, the players lose the game

attack_text: While Wrecker is attacking, he gets +2 ATK if the attack is undefended.
name: Wrecker
scheme_text: When Wrecker schemes, place the threat on his side scheme instead of the main scheme.

attack_text: While Wrecker is attacking, he gets +2 ATK if the attack is undefended.
name: Wrecker
scheme_text: When Wrecker schemes, place the threat on his side scheme instead of the main scheme.

name: Day of Reckoning
text: Wrecker's Side Scheme. This card cannot leave play while Wrecker is in play. Hard Hitter -- Forced Response: After threat is placed here, if there is 10 or more threat here, deal 2 damage to each friendly character. Remove all but 3 threat from this scheme.

name: Held Hostage
text: Attach to the active villain's side scheme. Threat cannot be removed from attacked scheme by thwarting. Hero Action: The villain corresponding to the attached side scheme attacks you. Then discard this card.

attack_text: Forced Response: After Wrecker attacks, place 1 threat on the side scheme with the least threat.
name: Magic Crowbar
text: Attach to Wrecker. Hero Action: Exhaust your hero and discard 1 card at random from your hand â†’ discard this card.

name: Wrecker's Command
scheme_text: Forced Response: After Wrecker schemes, place 1 threat on each other villain's side scheme.
text: Attach to Wrecker. Hero Action: Spend [physical] [physical] resources -> discard this card.

name: Corrupt Prison Guard
text: Guard. (While this minion is engaged with you, you cannot attack the villain.)

boost_text: Boost: Move the active counter to the villain whose side scheme has the least threat. If you are in hero form, that villain attacks you after this attack. That attack does not get a boost card.
name: Escaped Convict
text: Surge

boost_text: Move the active counter to the villain whose side scheme has the least threat.
name: Buddy System
text: When Revealed: Choose the villain whose side scheme has the least threat. Reveal the top card of his deck (top 2 cards instead if he is the only villain in play).

boost_text: If this attack is undefended, discard an upgrade you control.
name: Chaos In the Prison
text: When Revealed: Choose to either discard an upgrade you control or place 1 threat on the active villain's side scheme for each upgrade you control. If you do not control any upgrades, this card gains surge.

name: Crowbar Toss
text: When Revealed (Alter-Ego): Wrecker schemes. Then, move the active villain counter to the villain whose side scheme has the least threat. When Revealed (Hero): Wrecker attacks you. Then, move the active villain counter to the villain whose side scheme has the least threat.

name: Get Wrecked!
text: When Revealed (Alter-Ego): The villain whose side scheme has the most threat schemes. When Revealed (Hero): The villain whose side scheme has the least threat attacks you.

boost_text: Boost: Move the active counter to the villain with the least threat on his side scheme. That villain schemes.
name: I've Been Waiting For This!
text: When Revealed: The active villain heals 3 hit points. Give that villain a tough status card.

boost_text: Boost: Wrecker gets +3 ATK for this activation unless you place 2 threat on his side scheme.
name: Mystical Link
text: When Revealed: Place 2 threat on each side scheme.

name: You're Dead Meat!
text: When Revealed: Deal 1 damage to the hero or ally with the fewest remaining hit points. If that character is defeated this way, place 3 threat on Wrecker's side scheme.

attack_text: Forced Response: After Thunderball attacks you, deal 1 damage to each character you control.
name: Thunderball
scheme_text: When Thunderball schemes, place the threat on his side scheme instead of the main scheme.

attack_text: Forced Response: After Thunderball attacks you, deal 1 damage to each character you control.
name: Thunderball
scheme_text: When Thunderball schemes, place the threat on his side scheme instead of the main scheme.

name: Thunderstruck
text: Thunderball's Side Scheme. This card cannot leave play while Thunderball is in play. Gamma Blast -- Forced Response: After threat is placed here, if there is 10 or more threat here, stun each friendly character. Remove all but 3 threat from this scheme.

attack_text: Forced Response: After Thunderball attacks, place 1 threat on the main scheme.
name: Ball and Chain
text: Attach to Thunderball. Hero Action: Exhaust your hero and discard 1 card at random from your hand â†’ discard this card.

name: Held Hostage
text: Attach to the active villain's side scheme. Threat cannot be removed from attached scheme by thwarting. Hero Action: The villain corresponding to the attached side scheme attacks you. Then, discard this card.

attack_text: Forced Response: After Thunderball attacks, discard this card.
name: Radioactive Buildup
text:

Excess damage dealt by Thunderball is placed as threat on his corresponding side scheme.

name: Energy Projectiles
text: When Revealed: Deal 1 damage to each friendly character you control.

text: When Revealed (Alter-Ego): The villain whose side scheme has the most threat schemes. When Revealed (Hero): The villain whose side scheme has the least threat attacks you.

name: I've Been Waiting For This!
text: When Revealed: The active villain heals 3 hit points. Give that villain a tough status card.

name: Lightning Blast
text: When Revealed (Alter-Ego): Place 3 threat on the side scheme with the most threat. When Revealed (Hero): Thunderball attacks you. If this attack is undefended, place 3 threat on Thunderball's side scheme.

name: Tactical Prowess
text: When Revealed: Move all threat from the side scheme with the least threat to the side scheme with the most threat. If that scheme's "Forced Repsonse" ability is not triggered this way, this card gains surge.

name: Piledriver
scheme_text: When Piledriver schemes, place the threat on his side scheme instead of the main scheme.
text: Retaliate 1.

name: Piledriver
scheme_text: When Wrecker schemes, place the threat on his side scheme instead of the main scheme.

name: Pile It On!
text: Piledriver's Side Scheme. This card cannot leave play while Wrecker is in play. Pile Drive -- Forced Response: After threat is placed here, if there is 10 or more threat here, each player discards the upgrade or support they control with the highest cost. Remove all but 3 threat from this scheme.

name: Distracting Taunts
text: Attach to Piledriver. Piledriver gets +3 hit points. Players cannot attack other villains. Response: After your hero attacks Piledriver, spend [physical] [physical] resources â†’ discard this card.

name: Held Hostage
text: Attach to the active villain side scheme. Threat cannot be removed from attached scheme by thwarting. Hero Action: The villain corresponding to the attached side scheme attacks you. Then, discard this card.

text: Guard. (While this minion is engaged with you, you cannot attack the villain.)

name: I've Been Waiting For This!
text: When Revealed: The active villain heals 3 hit points. Give that villain a tough status card.

name: Oversized Hands
text: When Revealed: Discard the support you control with the highest cost. If no support was discarded this way, place 2 threat on the active villain's scheme.

boost_text: Boost: Give the active villain a tough status card. If they already have a tough status card, place 2 threat on their scheme.
name: Escape Plan
text: When Revealed: You are confused. If you are already confused, Piledriver schemes.

name: Pummel
text: When Revealed (Alter-Ego): Piledriver schemes. If Piledriver is tough, he gets +2 SCH for this activation. When Revealed (Hero): Piledriver attacks you. If Piledriver is tough, he gets +2 ATK for this activation.

name: Uncanny Resilience
text: When Revealed: Remove each stunned and confused status card from each villain. If no status cards were removed, this card gains surge.

attack_text: Forced Interrupt: When Bulldozer attacks, the attack gains overkill.
name: Bulldozer
scheme_text: When Piledriver schemes, place the threat on his side scheme instead of the main scheme.

attack_text: Forced Interrupt: When Bulldozer attacks, the attack gains overkill.
name: Bulldozer
scheme_text: When Bulldozer schemes, place the threat on his side scheme instead of the main scheme.

name: Clear the Road
text: Bulldozer's Side Scheme. This card cannot leave play while Bulldozer is in play. Charge! -- Forced Response: After threat is placed here, if there is 10 or more threat here, each player must discard the top 10 cards of their deck. Remove all but 3 threat from this scheme.

attack_text: Forced Response: After Bulldozer attacks you, discard 1 card from the top of your deck for each point of damage dealt by this attack.
name: Bulldozer's Helmet
text: Attach to Bulldozer. Hero Action: Exhaust your hero and discard 1 card at random from your hand â†’ discard this card.

name: Held Hostage
text: Attach to the active villain side scheme. Threat cannot be removed from attached scheme by thwarting. Hero Action: The villain corresponding to the attached side scheme attacks you. Then, discard this card.

attack_text: Forced Interrupt: When Bulldozer attacks you, you must defend against Bulldozer's attacks with an ally you control, if able. Forced Response: After Bulldozer attacks you, discard this card.
name: Ramming Speed
text: Attach to Bulldozer.

name: Corrupt Prison Guard
text: Guard. (While this minion is engaged with you, you cannot attack the villain.)

boost_text: Boost: Move the active counter to the villain whose side scheme has the least threat. If you are in hero form, that villain attacks you after this attack. That attack does not get a boost card.

name: Buddy System
text: When Revealed: Choose the villain whose side scheme has the least threat. Reveal the top card of his deck (top 2 cards instead if he is the only villain in play).

name: Bull Rush
text: When Revealed (Alter-Ego): Bulldozer schemes. Discard the top card of your deck for each threat placed by this activation. When Revealed (Hero): Bulldozer attacks you. Discard the top card of your deck for each damage dealt by this attack.

boost_text: Boost: If this attack is undefended, discard an upgrade you control.
name: Chaos In the Prison
text: When Revealed: Choose to either discard an upgrade you control or place 1 threat on the active villain's side scheme for each upgrade you control. If you do not control any upgrades, this card gains surge.

name: Get Wrecked!
text: When Revealed (Alter-Ego): The villain whose side scheme has the most threat schemes. When Revealed (Hero): The villain whose side scheme has the least threat attacks you.

name: Headbutt
text: When Revealed: Discard 1 card at random from your hand. If you are in hero form, take damage equal to that card's printed cost. If you are in alter-ego form, place threat on Bulldozer's side scheme equal to that card's printed cost.

name: Leading the Charge
text: When Revealed: Discard the top X cards of your deck, where X is Bulldozer's ATK. Place 1 threat on Bulldozer's side scheme for each different card type discarded this way
